snippet.title: Fish Fight Trailer #1 - Pre-Alpha
snippet.description:
We are making an open source game (MIT/Apache repository going public in 1-2 months) which we will put on all major game/app stores with a price tag. By charging money for the game product we can pay passionate game developers to make it even better.


We will share all parts of our game development suite as openly as humanely possible, i.e. so long as it doesn’t significantly impact our ability to keep developing the game in a sustainable manner.



Announcement post:
https://fishfight.itch.io/ff/devlog/281554/fish-fight-reloaded


Tweet to help us make a stronger pitch to publishers:
https://twitter.com/fishfightgame/status/1424084016467226624
